requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 12th gen i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950/Radeon R7 370 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should work even on worse components than those listed.
